text: HRly 7rzy  TTHT xifeasrut 344 _ Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 (S7 Wdrr 3r  TrArf TTTETH) T4H / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 & 6, 4427-10 , ERTT, # frait-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10_ Dwarka, New Delhi- 110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 04.12.2015 PQLCY MAITERS-Iechnical (188/2015) Decision taken 262d Meeting of Executive Committee vide agenda item no. 262.01) Sub: Clarification to the policy circular no_ 59/2009 dated 13.10.2009 regarding payment of escalation to the Consultants/Independent Engineer /Independent consultant where there is no provision of escalation in the Contract - reg: It has come to the notice that the policy circular No. Admn./Finance (59/2009) dated 13.10.2009 on payment of escalation for existing Supervision Consultancy services contracts is being interpreted differently . 2 Accordingly, with the approval of the Competent AUthority, the following clarifications are issued: I) It shall be applicable for Independent Engineering Services also with a condition that the respective Concessionaire shall also agree with the escalation approved by the Authority. It shall also be  applicable to the consultancy contracts   signed after issuance of circular, where the escalation clause is not provided. (iii) The contracts, where escalation is provided only once, the escalation is to be compounded from second escalation onwards and in case of consultancy contracts where the escalation has not been provided the escalation is to be paid on base rates without compounding: 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (A.K. Singh) Chief General Manager (Coord:) To: AIl Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. CnMM WHALS
